page.description: This is the default event that fires when the right mouse button is clicked over an item in a viewbox. The item cannot have a local onRightClick event in its definition if the default onRightClick event is to be used.

section.description: If an onRightClick event is tied to a specific item's definition, then this localized event will be used in place of the default. The default onRightClick event only fires if an item does NOT contain a onRightClick event in the item definition.
